## Reproducibility Notes

These are a series of commentaries that will highlight topics related to the production of robust, effective and reproducible science

**Schwab, S.**, & Held, L. (2021). Statistical programming: Small mistakes, big impacts. *Significance, 18(3)*, 6–7. [doi:10.1111/1740-9713.01522](https://doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01522)

**Schwab, S.**, & Held, L. (2020). Different worlds Confirmatory versus exploratory research. *Significance, 17(2)*, 8–9. [doi:10.1111/1740-9713.01369](https://doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01369)
